Solving word problems lengths of a triangle - Online Tutor - Free Math Videos

[imath]"The perimeter of a triangle is 86[/imath][imath]0[/imath][imath]inches. The largest side is four inches less than twice the small-[/imath][imath]est side. The third side is 10[/imath][imath]inches longer than the smallest side. What is the length of each[/imath][imath]4[/imath][imath]side?[/imath]
